channel.title: Node.js on Yadullah Duman
channel.description: Recent content in Node.js on Yadullah Duman

item.title: My first NPM library: rmby
item.description: Recently, I released version 1.0 of my first Node.js library called rmby. In this post, I want to explain what it is, what it does and how you can use it. On the bottom of this post you will find the respective links. What is rmby? Link to heading rmby (“remove by”) is a zero-dependency Node.js library for removing files asynchronously on a given directory by certain filter criteria’s. It provides a fluent interface that guides the user when creating the remove query.
